code:
```mermaid
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
        actor User as User
        participant WebUI as WebUI
        participant Server as Server
        participant Database as Database
        User ->>+ WebUI: Access role management page
        WebUI ->>+ Server: GET / role{}
        Server ->> +Database : Get role list
        Database -->>- Server: Return role list
        Server -->> WebUI : 200 / {meta, role list}
        WebUI -->> User: Display role list
        User->>WebUI: Choose a role to be edited
        
        alt User confirms edition [Main flow]
        WebUI-->>User: Confirm edition
            User->> WebUI: Edit role info
            WebUI ->>+ Server: PUT / role{role data}
            Server->>+Database: Update role
            Database-->>-Server: Return updated role detail
            Server-->>WebUI:200 / {meta, role detail}
            WebUI-->>User:Display successful message
        else User cancels edition [Exception flow]
            User->>WebUI: Cancel edition
            WebUI-->>User: Edition cancelled
        end
        WebUI->>-WebUI: Refresh role list
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
